subject: USA IRS AUTHORITY .
body:
USA IRS AUTHORITY .
This is to inform you that your ATM CARD of $3.6 Million USA Dollars
was stop now from delivering to your home address, 
you are to pay $25
APPLE GIFT CARD OR STEAM WALLET /AMAZON CARD for IRS stamp and IRS
clearance certificate 
before your ATM CARD will be immediately release
for delivery without any further delay. Attach is your copy of your
ATM CARD
Note, you have only 24 hours to pay the fee or your fund will be
transfer to Government Treasure as on unclaimed fund. Get Back to us,
Yours Agent
Mr.Mike Edward

subject: Re: USA IRS AUTHORITY .
body:
Dear Edward,

Thank you for your email. However, I must inform you that I have not applied for an ATM card nor am I expecting any funds. There seems to be a misunderstanding or mistake. Could you please check your records again?

Best wishes,
Dennis
